Description: Effective 5/16, face coverings required in all public settings while limited retail reopening proceeds.
Primary Mobility Impact: Reduces close-contact risk in commercial/transit settings; underpins cautious reopening.

Description: Individuals arriving from out of state must self-isolate for 14 days or for the duration of their stay.
Primary Mobility Impact: Raises the cost of interstate trips, reducing non-essential travel and visits.

Description: Quarantine eased for travelers from low-risk states; Safe Certified hotels may increase capacity.
Primary Mobility Impact: Allows a measured uptick in interstate travel under safeguards.

Description: From 10/16, closing hours imposed for some venues; on 10/23, hotspot retail/food rules strengthened.
Primary Mobility Impact: Suppresses nightlife/weekend mobility and high-risk contacts.

Description: Residents instructed to stay home except for essential trips; mass gatherings capped at five.
Primary Mobility Impact: Sharp reduction in non-essential trips and cross-area activities during winter surge.
